page.title: 08Health in Fakenham.
page.content: {Fakenham Health Centre}in Barons Close is a base for the School Medical Officer, School Dental Officer, Health Visitor + 2 clerks + School Nurse, Social Workers, Home Help Organiser and Speech Therapist. Clinics: School Dental, Diabetic, Baby,Speech Therapy, Family Planning. Other activities: monthly Blind Club meeting, toddlers' group, ante-natal and relaxation exercise classes, craft day courses for the physically handicapped, and Canoe Club evening meetings. {The Ambulance Service}has 3 ambulances which are called out in emergencies by a 999 call or by a doctor, and are used for routine ferrying of patients who cannot travel to hospitals or clinics by any other means. The ambulance station is in Barons Close, beside the Fire Station.
